name: R-3PO (Ar-Threepio) (V)
Lore: 'Designed as a response to the threat of Imperial espionage droids. Joins a droid pool and uncovers spies. Has tattoo reading ''Thank The Maker'' on left posterior plating.',
Text: 'Destiny +1 when drawn for weapon or battle destiny. During your control phase, if with opponent''s Undercover spy, opponent loses 2 Force (may not be reduced). If a spy here ''breaks cover'' or is lost, may place R-3PO in Used Pile.',
